taxon.author: (Blackwall, 1867)
taxon.distribution: Probably Africa and/or Asia. Introduced to the Americas, Belgium, Germany, Australia, Micronesia

referenceObject.reference: Blackwall, J. (1867a). Descriptions of several species of East Indian spiders, apparently to be new or little known to arachnologists. Annals and Magazine of Natural History (3) 19(114): 387-394.
